website_summaries.verdict: A hypoallergenic shower gel that's perfect for those with dry, sensitive skin.
pros: A great option if you suffer from dry or sensitive skin
Fresh scent suitable for men or women
Moisturizes skin without leaving a greasy residue behind
cons: This product doesn't produce a rich lather, and you may have to use a large amount of gel each time to get results

customer_reviews.title: It is the best thing ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had very bad acne all over my body and nothing seemed to help but this. I struggled with it for so long, visited many dermatologist- still nothing. I saw this body wash on a website as an option and i decided to give it a try. It is AMAZING!!! It removed my body acne in 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Bergita M

customer_reviews.title: High quality and non-irritating!
customer_reviews.text: I use nothing else. I suffer with eczema and this is the only shower gel that doesn't make me itch! It rinses easily, and has a light pleasant fragrance that doesn't linger on the skin. I now use all Bioderma products and couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: WRW

customer_reviews.title: great shower gel
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. It is a big bottle, shipped intact and on time. The gel has a very pleasant light scent in my opinion. Doesn't lather up a whole lot which is ok. I think more lather/suds means more chemicals that are more drying to the skin. I also got more suds when using a shower puff, but using straight out of the bottle not a lot. Rinsed off nicely without feeling a residue. Did it leave me feeling super moisturized? No. But, I also didn't feel like grabbing body lotion right away. Overall, I am happy with the product and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: shoe addict

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t find it to be especially moisturizing, but it has a nice light scent and doesn’t seem to leave a residue on my skin like some other body washes. I purchased it after reading a blog post stating that it was very helpful with bacne but my bacne is just the same as it was before. It’s expensive for a plain old body wash (the bottle is fairly large, though) that doesn’t do anything bar soap or another dry skin body wash couldn’t, so I probably won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: roobugtwo

customer_reviews.title: This is a "Wow!" product.
customer_reviews.text: This shower gel is the very first one that didn't leave my skin feeling tight, dry, and itchy. I usually have to apply an anti-itch lotion on my back immediately after showering but didn't need to after using this product the first time. It took me aback as I am so used to that dry feeling. I felt just as clean as well. It lathers up very nicely, and the scent is very light and pleasant. I'd recommend this to anyone with dry or sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Has sodium laureth sulfate that depletes moisture
customer_reviews.text: It has moisturizing ingredients and a pleasant scent, but its main cleaning agent is sodium laureth sulfate that strips my skin of moisture. Sodium laureth sulfate is used in cheap $3 shower gels. It baffles me why this seemingly higher end (and much more expensive) product uses such a harsh ingredient that depletes moisture and worsens my eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! If you have sensitive skin and break out on ur body this is for you!!
customer_reviews.text: No matter what wash I use I always break out and my skin will feel tight and dry or not clean at all. I’ve been using this for almost a month now and it has been getting rid of the bacne I had and prevents new ones from forming. My skin feels so soft, clean, and hydrated. This didn’t disrupt my ph levels either which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Beware the itch!
customer_reviews.text: I was using Vanicream for dry skin and all was going well. It was great. Then I saw this and thought I'd get the pretty blue bottle of a NIGHTMARE. My daughter used it as well and now we're both itching all over. Not just me but her too. So there's something in this that has made us feel like flea-infested dogs. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardine Cizmar

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t recommend this if you want a really clean feeling. But if you’re one of those people who need to feel super moisturized while taking a shower so that you don’t have to put lotion on afterwards then this is probably for you. But if you’re like me and you put on moisturizer anyways then this soap is not for you it doesn’t clean all the way through it’s just like designer soap.
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. My entire family loves this. A few pumps go a long way if you use a loofah. But it’s kinda expensive. I still think it’s worth it though, it’s important to keep your skin healthy and clean as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Layne G

customer_reviews.title: My holy grail!
customer_reviews.text: Learned about this product through Huda Beauty, really does combat body acne! Absolutely wonderful for sensitive skin. I’ve already purchased this twice and will continue to in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Livie

customer_reviews.title: Expensive (as an import) but great product. No more need for shaving gel!
customer_reviews.text: Addicted to this stuff. I think the ingredients are great, makes me feel clean and never over-dry, & fabulous for shaving. Just wish it cost the same as it does in France ;(
customer_reviews.author: belle flâneuse

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Smells like kids bubble solution, no added fragrance that I can detect. It’s very gentle, lathers beautifully, and I’m able to shave with this nicely too. I really love this soap, as it’s not at all irritating to my super sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR US SENSITIVE SKIN PEOPLE
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this body wash because I have such sensitive skin. This product does its job. It is not creamy, which I don’t care for. It does not have gluten in it and I can’t have it on my skin. So I just couldn’t be more pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but I need more moisture
customer_reviews.text: I found I needed more moisture, so I switched to the Huile de Douche. I gave this to my daughter who loves it. It does create a better foam if that’s important. I feel like I use more of the Huile. I do wish the Intensive Baume (all of their moisturizers) came in a similar size.
customer_reviews.author: Freckled One

customer_reviews.title: Can’t do without it
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using it for the past 9 years. It was first recommended to her by our dermatologist back in France. She has mild eczema on her legs. It is the only shower gel she can use as it’s barely fragranced, and though it doesn’t hydrate her skin it doesn’t either deplete her skin from its natural protective barrier. This shower gel and a hydrating lotion containing high amounts of Shea butter and she’s good all year round.
customer_reviews.author: Santos Christophe

customer_reviews.title: Makes dry skin soft.
customer_reviews.text: My skin is so thankful for this product. In the desert it's hard to keep skin soft and moisturized. This works!!
customer_reviews.author: Rabunza

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower gel
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower gel! Fresh clean scent for men and women. It's so gentle I've actually used it to cleanse my face in the shower- my eyes didn't sting surprisingly. Great product and leaves skin soft like no other gel I've used!
customer_reviews.author: Keely B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shower Gel
customer_reviews.text: Bioderma Atoderm Shower Gel is excellent. Highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Recent Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for the perfect shower gel for a long time. I've tried various brands at all price points but this just might be my HG. This has a very light scent, fresh and clean. It does not compete with other products you may choose to use. It has some lather but not an overwhelming amount. It leaves my skin soft and not dry or flaky. I've used other gels that either seem to strip my skin of all moisture or are so thick and "moisturizing" that I almost feel greasy getting out of the shower. This could be the shower gel I have been searching for.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeGalForever

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: it does the job but there is nothing special about it. the scent is not particularly exhilarating--it was kind of "not there"--and my skin didn't feel particularly moisturized. It didn't dry out my skin, but I think I'll switch to a bath oil instead.
customer_reviews.author: PunB

customer_reviews.title: Good for minor drying shin
customer_reviews.text: Did not relieve my drying itching skin...but I guess for mild drying shin is fine...Great for using to wash hands..!!!
customer_reviews.author: edmond

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Every year my son gets dry and itchy skin this product really helps. Now he uses it year round. Really works.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Leave My Skin Feeling Good
customer_reviews.text: Starting out, this wash left my skin feeling soft. But over time I noticed that I never felt clean after using it. It does not lather or spread well. My skin feels dry, not clean, and as if there's residue. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Athena Sternklar

customer_reviews.title: I have a sensitive skin and I think this one works
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand it's French... I'm always looking for the soap with the least added chemical products and this one seems to be the one. P.S: I bought the biggest bottle.
customer_reviews.author: PJL

customer_reviews.title: Great Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash. It is very moisturizing and smells GOOD. Will repurchase
customer_reviews.author: DeLandrias

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this body wash. Although there’s not much of a scent to it, it has changed my skin completely! It 100% moisturizes and has made my skin super soft. I probably won’t ever use another body wash again it’s that great.
customer_reviews.author: Christa White

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: A small product that goes really quickly! Smells nice, but nothing mind blowing about how it works.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! Leaves my skin soft; I LOVE the smell; and even the bottle is pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Chin Music

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but smells pretty
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special, except it's price. I have dry and sensitive skin and this did not help at all, nor did it make any damage. It's just an overpriced product. I don't get what the hype is about.
customer_reviews.author: Suli

customer_reviews.title: For itchy skin
customer_reviews.text: I still trying out the product, but I was able to sleep at night without itching.
customer_reviews.author: ccross

customer_reviews.title: Another Bioderma hit!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bioderma and this is a great shower liquid. It is gentle and moisturizing and both my husband and I enjoy using it. The scent is very light. The container is large and the pump works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DProf

customer_reviews.title: Soften skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shower gel on my kids since they were born. 7 years later they still shower with it. It makes their skin soft and moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my and my sons sensitive skin. We love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is so gentle I haven’t had a breakout since I started using it
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne M. Romero

customer_reviews.title: So good. Leaves skin feeling clean, but moisturized. Smell is incredible, too.
customer_reviews.text: So good. Leaves skin feeling clean, but moisturized. Smell is incredible, too. Get the size with the pump!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Bought it to use on my super sensitive skin and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Happyredhead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Lathers up nicely. Smells pleasant and is gently but gets me clean!
customer_reviews.author: PopozaoPopozao

customer_reviews.title: Will use this forever!
customer_reviews.text: This body wash has helped clear up my body acne! It’s very moisturizing and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: DDC

customer_reviews.title: Did not help me
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product because the reviews seemed fairly positive. I randomly started breaking out on my back and chest so, I thought this product would help. After a couple weeks my acne is worst than before.
customer_reviews.author: Neang's

customer_reviews.title: a must for soft skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff...I've never found a body wash that actually made my skin look and feel better. This made my skin much softer.
customer_reviews.author: procurements

customer_reviews.title: Great shower gel for the entire family
customer_reviews.text: Gentle cleansing gel, hardly scented, perfect for my sensitive skin prone to psoriasis.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Only soap that doesn't cause me to break out in rashes
customer_reviews.author: E. Shields

customer_reviews.title: Good, But...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product itself. It smells great, but it's difficult to open. This morning, I broke the cover trying to get it open, so now it's not secure :(
customer_reviews.author: Maria Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking this so far skin feels super great . Very clean . I'm liking the outcome of using this.
customer_reviews.author: ruben

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: I loved the smell leaves my body nice and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Pariona

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Received on time. Love the scent. Makes my skin feel clean, soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It’s very gentle and I use it for everything. Smells really good also.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: No scent, very mild , great cleansing. Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Mild and lovely.
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this in France and became addicted -- I feel clean but my skin doesn't feel stripped. Definitely my go-to body wash; I always have the largest size in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies and adults.
customer_reviews.text: I like the scent that it has, this is a must-have for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower gel, cleans perfectly without drying skin. I sometimes use it to wash off make up too.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT..
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good for delicate skin. Unfortunately the box was opened.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle sent
customer_reviews.text: Bottle came completely broken - broken pump and I couldn’t use it. Waste.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Farina

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job. I like the product and definitely will ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I've ordered it. It's a shower gel. Does a good job. I like the product and definitely will order it to replenish when the current stock becomes low.
customer_reviews.author: TheDude

customer_reviews.title: Dry sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is meant for dry sensitive skin. I have been using it for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product but...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrvied damaged... The cap was shattered at the time of arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Aleks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect this shower gel leaves my skin soft and hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on my kid
customer_reviews.text: I got this shower gel to use it on my son he has a dry skin, but it did not work at all his skin still the same not even a slight improvement, so now I am just using is as a hand soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bioderma is a wonderful product line... too bad it isn't as well known in the US.
customer_reviews.author: LMJ

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gentle product & good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful gentle product & good value for the money. I will always be a user as nothing else compares with its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gel, convenient bottle, hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: My regular shower gel was out of stock so I thought I'd give this one a try - and I'm glad I did :-) I like the bottle with the pump, it's super convenient in the shower! I also like the fact that it's relatively scent-free. I have terribly sensitive skin, very prone to allergies, and I usually break out unless I use my regular shower gel - yet this one did not cause a reaction! Yay! Also, it seems that the bottle will last a month or so with regular everyday use. I recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: A gentle, economical cleanser for all skin types
customer_reviews.text: Bioderma makes good products. This is one of them - a wonderfully gentle, foaming cleanser that's very economical to use and definitely non-irritating for even the most sensitive of skins. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Constance C. Jones

product_meta.title: Bioderma - Atoderm - Shower Gel - Body and Face Moisturizing - for Family with Normal to Dry Sensitive Skin
product_meta.description: Size:200ml / 6.67 Fl OzA daily soap-free cleansing shower gel that can be used on the face and body to gently hydrate and contributes to soothe dry skin. Thanks to its moisturizing ingredients, the cleansing gel softens your dry skin with its creamy moisturizing foam. Its soothing properties helps to decrease discomfort. It is suitable for the whole family.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
